reviewText: This is truly a work of art! I highly recommend it. Your kids can watch it, you can watch it, you can screen it at a party for your guests to be amazed. It is something I am glad I have in my collection. I really love his work and find them incredibly inspiring.

Li: The Patterns of Nature and other films by John N. Campbell This is a great compilation of short films that stimulate the imagination. I also find them relaxing to enjoy. Check it out! A bargain at $25!
